# uberspace_maildomain (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uberspace_maildomain" "mail" {
  asteroid = "isabell"
  name     = "mail.isabell.uber.space"
}

resource "uberspace_mailuser" "tom" {
  // a mail user usually depends on a mail domain
  depends_on = [uberspace_maildomain.mail]

  name            = "tom"
  password_hash   = "xxx"
  asteroid_name   = "tf"
  maildomain_name = uberspace_maildomain.mail.name
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `asteroid` (String) Name of a hosting account, e.g. 'isabell'.
- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `asteroid_name` (String)
- `format` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `dns_error` (String) Error encountered when checking DNS records.
- `dns_last_check` (String) When the DNS records were checked last.
- `dns_state` (String) * `VALID` - valid
* `INVALID` - invalid, could check, but invalid result
* `ERROR` - error, could not check
* `UNCHECKED` - unchecked, did not check yet
- `domain` (String)
- `domain_display` (String)
- `domain_idn` (String)
- `name_display` (String)
- `name_idn` (String)
- `updated_at` (String)
